title: Test fails at beforeAll hook prepare suite with Truffle 5.1.18
body:
- [x] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

What the issue is, in broad strokes.

We detected in our CI pipeline that after the truffle version bump in npm the tests stopped working, so me and my peer debugged locally and found this error since truffle 5.1.16 and with latest 5.1.18.

Our current fix is to set truffle to 5.1.13 at package.json, without a carot to set it fixed. 

Since truffle 5.1.16 , cant run tests. Tried with 5.1.18 with no luckl. The test fails before running the test suite.
```
1) Contract: Authorization module
       "before all" hook: prepare suite:
     TypeError: Cannot read property 'deployedContext' of undefined
      at Object.getEventAllocations (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/codec/dist/lib/abi-data/allocate/index.js:662:1)                                                        
      at new WireDecoder (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/decoders.js:204:1)                                                                                    
      at Object.<anonymous> (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:223:1)                                                                                    
      at step (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:164:1)     
      at Object.next (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:145:45)                                                                                          
      at /home/kartojal/repos/contracts-solidity/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:139:1                                                                 
      at new Promise (<anonymous>)                                                           
      at __awaiter (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:135:1)
      at Object.forProject (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:219:1)                                                                                     
      at TestRunner.initialize (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/core/lib/testing/testrunner.js:84:1)                                                                         
      at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:86:5)                    

  2) Contract: Lending module
       "before all" hook: prepare suite:
     TypeError: Cannot read property 'deployedContext' of undefined
      at Object.getEventAllocations (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/codec/dist/lib/abi-data/allocate/index.js:662:1)                                                        
      at new WireDecoder (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/decoders.js:204:1)                                                                                    
      at Object.<anonymous> (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:223:1)                                                                                    
      at step (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:164:1)     
      at Object.next (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:145:45)                                                                                          
      at /home/kartojal/repos/contracts-solidity/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:139:1                                                                 
      at new Promise (<anonymous>)                                                           
      at __awaiter (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:135:1)
      at Object.forProject (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:219:1)                                                                                     
      at TestRunner.initialize (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/core/lib/testing/testrunner.js:84:1)                                                                         
      at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:86:5)                    

  3) Contract: Subscription module
       "before all" hook: prepare suite:
     TypeError: Cannot read property 'deployedContext' of undefined
      at Object.getEventAllocations (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/codec/dist/lib/abi-data/allocate/index.js:662:1)                                                        
      at new WireDecoder (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/decoders.js:204:1)                                                                                    
      at Object.<anonymous> (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:223:1)                                                                                    
      at step (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:164:1)     
      at Object.next (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:145:45)                                                                                          
      at /home/kartojal/repos/contracts-solidity/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:139:1                                                                 
      at new Promise (<anonymous>)                                                           
      at __awaiter (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:135:1)
      at Object.forProject (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/decoder/dist/index.js:219:1)                                                                                     
      at TestRunner.initialize (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/core/lib/testing/testrunner.js:84:1)                                                                         
      at processTicksAndRejections (internal/process/task_queues.js:86:5)    
```
## Steps to Reproduce
Tested with Node 11
```
git clone --single-branch --branch LP-000-truffle-5.1.18 https://gitlab.com/raisehq/contracts-solidity.git/
touch private.key # create empty file to prevent an error check in the repo config, priv key not needed for local reproduction.
npm i
npm run compile
npm run test
```


## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.
Test should run normaly

## Actual Results

Test exited at `"before all" prepare suite`

Tests should fail with next error
`TypeError: Cannot read property 'deployedContext' of undefined
      at Object.getEventAllocations (node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/codec/dist/lib/abi-data/allocate/index.js:662:1)  `

## Environment

* Operating System: Ubuntu 16.04
* Ethereum client: ganache
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): 5.1.18
* node version (`node --version`): v11.15.0
* npm version (`npm --version`): 6.7.0

PD1: At Truffle GItter there was another guy with the same issue, he pointed that MAYBE was pragma mismatch between openzeppelin contracts and the repository contracts. After he upgraded all to Solidity v6 all worked. This current reproduction case is with openzeppeling at ^0.5.0 and the cotnracts with pragma at 0.5.12 .
Thanks for reporting this!  Do you have a reproduction example we could use to help narrow down the problem?  Thank you!

Also, you mentioned it works on 5.1.13; do you know just which version the problem first appeared on?

Edit: OK, checking the diffs, it looks like this file didn't change at all from 5.1.13 to 5.1.15, so 5.1.15 should work, and it must have been 5.1.16 that introduced the problem.  Can you confirm this?  (But the best thing as I said above would be to get us a repro example so we can check this out ourselves.)  Thanks!

Hi, I've asked in gitter about this same issue. I was using the latest truffle version before I uninstalled and reinstalled to an earlier version.

I fixed the problem using these two commands:
`npm uninstall -g truffle`
`npm install -g truffle@5.1.14`

I tried v5.1.15 and still got this exact same error. Looks like version 5.1.15+ was giving me the error.

When I run truffle version on the version that does not give me this error this is the output:
`Truffle v5.1.14 (core: 5.1.14)
Solidity - 0.6.2 (solc-js)
Node v12.3.1
Web3.js v1.2.1`

Here is my truffle.js solc settings:
`compilers: {
    solc: {
      version: "0.6.2",    // Fetch exact version from solc-bin (default: truffle's version)
      docker: false,        // Use "0.5.1" you've installed locally with docker (default: false)
      settings: {          // See the solidity docs for advice about optimization and evmVersion
       optimizer: {
         enabled: false,
         runs: 200
       },
       evmVersion: "constantinople"
      }
    }
  }`

Tried to replicate this in truffle boxes, but couldn't do it.
OK, do you have a reproduction example I could inspect?  It would make it a lot easier to determine what's going on.  Thank you!

Check **Steps to Reproduce** please, there is a reproduction of the bug in the indicated repository branch at the git clone command.

I can reproduce it with 5.1.16
Ah, I see, I misread and missed that.  Thanks, will take a look!

@kartojal Um, sorry, but I'm getting a repository not found error when I try to clone your repo:

```
Cloning into 'LP-000-truffle-5.1.16'...
fatal: repository 'https://gitlab.com/raisehq/contracts-solidity/-/tree/LP-000-truffle-5.1.16/' not found
```

Any idea why / any other way I could get my hands on a copy?  Thanks!

It happened on truffle version 5.1.17, too.
And runs normally on version 5.1.13.
@juwitaw OK, good to know.  Do you have a reproduction example I chould check out by any chance?

I tried to reproduce with a simple token contract.
Please check on this repo:
https://github.com/juwitaw/simple-test-token/tree/repro-truffle-5.1.17

It runs on docker.
1. Build the image, `docker build -t simpletests:dev .`
2. Run using docker-compose command, `docker-compose -f docker_compose_test.yml up --abort-on-container-exit`
It will show this kind of error like the below picture.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17060491/77221703-b1b98c00-6b7e-11ea-98a4-6d203f62d499.png)

To try the expected result,
1. Change `Dockerfile` first line into `FROM juwitaw/truffle-base-image:truffle5.1.13-0.6.3`
2. Build the image, `docker build -t simpletests:dev .`
3. Run using docker-compose command, `docker-compose -f docker_compose_test.yml up --abort-on-container-exit`
It will show the expected result as below,
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17060491/77221733-03faad00-6b7f-11ea-8cc2-14ce0fd1734b.png)

Enviroment:
    Operating System: Alpine Linux
    Ethereum client: ganache-cli v6.9.1
    Truffle version (truffle version): 5.1.17
    node version (node --version): v12.16.1

While reproducing this error, I found that if I remove `SashimiToken` file and test file, the test runs well even with truffle 5.1.17 version. 
And if I remove all the `SushiToken` and left the `SashimiToken` alone, the test still runs as expected result.
I thought if the contract didn't have any or only little dependency with other contracts, the test will run well. But it still just my thought.

Hope it will help.
OK, thanks!  I'm going to first try to see if I can reproduce it without Docker for simplicity.  Also thanks for doing a bit to narrow down the interaction here.  Anyway, I'll take a look!

@juwitaw So, um, your example that you put up doesn't actually seme to include this `SashimiToken` that you mention; only the `SushiToken`?  As  a result I was not able to reproduce the error.  Could you include the `SashimiToken` as well?  Thank you!
Oh, silly me!  Yes, I see it now.  Great, I'll take a look, thanks again!
OK, thanks a bunch for the example, I've put up #2908 to address this!

Sorry for the delay, try with this reproduction steps:
```
git clone --single-branch --branch LP-000-truffle-5.1.18 https://gitlab.com/raisehq/contracts-solidity.git/
touch private.key # create empty file to prevent an error check in the repo config, priv key not needed for local reproduction.
npm i
npm run compile
npm run test
```

Also updated the issue and tried with latest 5.1.18 truffle version but no luck.

PD1: At Truffle GItter there was another guy with the same issue, he pointed that MAYBE was pragma mismatch between openzeppelin contracts and the repository contracts. After he upgraded all to Solidity v6 all worked. This current reproduction case is with openzeppeling at ^0.5.0 and the cotnracts with pragma at 0.5.12 .
OK, fix has been released, so closing this.  Let me know if there's still a problem.

@G-TipSolutions That appears to be an unrelated problem.  It also appears to be because the transaction you've put in there is reverting.  I'd suggest opening a [support request](https://trufflesuite.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Thanks!
